channel.title: Debian on Addy's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Debian on Addy's Blog

item.title: Automatically Generate Openbox Applications Menu
item.description: Introduction With regard to Openbox Menus, there are two types: static menus and dynamic menus. Dynamic menus are also known as pipe menu. In this article, I will explain how to use pipe menu to generate applications list easily. Because, writing our applications list manually to menu.xml will be exhausting. I use Debian by the way. So some command line in this article, like how to install packages, will use Debian way.
